title: Feds Watching
copy: A dry, tasteful romp twists Pharrell's croon and a guitar wail into hollow tones and itchy 808s, which makes 2 Chainz's preposterous-sounding claims just plausible enough.

title: Shot
copy: A retro-groovy retelling of Romeo and Juliet for the OKCupid generation.

title: Funeral For My Future Childen
copy: The song's title is brutal. But the Swedish singer renders "Funeral for My Future Children" as mournfully majestic as can be, with the unlikely accompaniment of a gigantic pipe organ.
